Text: Hiroyuki Ito:  He is known as the director of "Final Fantasy VI" (1994), "Final Fantasy IX" (2000) and "Final Fantasy XII" (2006) and as the creator of the Active Time Battle (ATB) system in the "Final Fantasy" series.
